title: Meet up

text: Menginap di Ibis Harmoni Jakarta pertama kali sangat berkesan untuk saya dan membuat ingin kembali lagi. Pelayanan dari staffnya sangat OK, semuanya cekatan, ramah, sopan dan helpfuly. Terutama Mirzol dan Dwi bagian Security, Arshi, Rahmat dan Wildan di bagian Resepsionis, Agus, Buldan dan Eka di bagian housekeeping, Puput dan achmad di bagian restaurant serta Rahmat, Ivan, Nurhadi di bagian kitchen. Dimulai dari saya datang dan selama saya stay semua staff sangat baik dalam memberikan pelayanan dan membantu saya. Lokasi strategis dekat dengan stasiun memudahkan akses saya saat tiba di Jakarta, saya dan Yani istri saya sangat puas dan terbantu sekali selama saya stay disini, semoga nanti saat saya kembali ke Indonesia dapat stay di Ibis Jakarta Harmoni lagi. Sukses selalu Ibis Harmoni, pertahankan excellent service yang kalian miliki.

text:
Dibanding ibis yang lain, kamar standar di ibis Jakarta Harmoni lebih luas. Hanya saja kamar mandi + toilet lebih sempit dan tekanan air jet shower tidak deras. Yang lainnya biasa saja, sesuai dengan standar ibis.

Di ibis lain, sajian selamat datang untuk anggota Accor Plus biasanya berupa kue atau cokelat. Tapi di ibis Jakarta Harmoni mendapatkan rujak buah segar dengan bumbu yang pas, dan saya sangat menyukainya.

Kelebihan di ibis Jakarta Harmoni adalah anggota Accor Plus mendapatkan keistimewaan ketika di lounge dan restoran pada saat sarapan, yakni mendapatkan minuman spesial dan menu ala carte spesial.

text:
Pilihan tepat memilih Hotel Ibis Jakarta Harmoni saat urusan bisnis maupun liburan, lokasi hotel berada di Jakarta Pusat yang mudah diakses baik dengan kendaraan pribadi maupun kendaraan umum. Dekat dengan Stasiun Jakarta Kota dan halte trans Jakarta. Dekat dengan obyek wisata kawasan Kota Tua Jakarta. Selain lokasi hotel yang sangat strategis banyak keunggulan saat menginap di Ibis Jakarta Harmoni ini

Seperti saat aku staycation beberapa waktu lalu aku sangat tertarik dengan My Room dengan tema hutan yang sangat IG-able selain itu ada tema traveling dan movie. Semua kamar sangat nyaman dan dilengkapi dengan fasilitas yang sangat memanjakan bagi tamu.

Untuk menu sarapan cukup bervariasi, cita rasanya pun enak. Dan menu room service nya juga lengkap dan pilihannya banyak. Saat order makanan jam 12 malam pun dilayani dengan sangat ramah dan cepat.

Ada fasilitas O-Bike yang bisa disewa saat CFD, over all sangat menyenangkan bisa menginap di ibis Jakarta Harmoni, staf nya baik dan ramah, makanan juara enaknya, pokonya aku rekomendasikan untuk liburan di Hotel ibis Jakarta Harmoni ini

Saya merasa ada yang aneh dengan kasurnya. Mungkin karena dilapis, jadi terasa empuk terlalu dalam. Walaupun begitu, tidur saya tetap lelap. Yang saya suka dari hotel ini adalah fasilitas kursi yang ada didekat jendela. Sangat membantu untuk meletakkan barang-barang, jika membawa banyak barang.

text:
Menginap di ibis bantal merah termasuk pengalaman yang jarang. Lebih sering di bantal hijau atau bantal biru. Entah mengapa ibis Jakarta Harmoni ini malah terlihat menarik. Apalagi waktu melihat promo weekend escape.

Dari check in sudah disambut, reservasi pakai aplikasi Accor ternyata mendapatkan pelayanan lebih dan benefit lainnya. Dapat voucher welcome drink yang langsung aku tukar di lounge bar dengan segelas jus melon yang segar.

Paket weekend escape aku kali ini spesial, karena kamar yang aku pesan adalah kamar yang sangat terbatas. Hanya ada 3 yang masing-masing punya tema berbeda. Aku pun mendapat kamar tema hutan, alias Jungle Room.

Kamarnya luas, fasilitas lengkap, dengan dekorasi unik dan detail yang menggambarkan tema. TVnya lebar dengan channel beragam pilihan. Ada kulkas pula di kamar. Eh jangan lupa, hotelnya ibis di Indonesia pasti ada gulingnya hehehe.

Kamar mandinya juga unik dan lucu. Masih menggambarkan konsep hutan sesuai tema. Perlengkapan mandi tersedia lengkap plus ada pengering rambut. Air panas juga mengalir deras, drainase pun lancar.

Ada restoran yang lucu dan menu-menunya enak. Salah satu rekomendasi sih sup buntut panggang. Maknyus!

Paket weekend escape membuat aku mendapat voucher rental sepeda obike. Bisa aku pakai saat Minggu pagi jadi bisa ke CFD. Plus aku dapat voucher pool dan gym. Tentu bukan di ibis Harmoni nge-gym dan berenangnya, tapi aku bisa berenang dan nge-gym, bahkan sarapan, di hotel-hotel pilihan Accor yang ada di area CFD. Asyiklah!

Ibis Harmoni semacam menawarkan paket lengkap liburan keluarga tanpa harus jauh-jauh keluar Jakarta. Apalagi kalau akhir pekan, bisa sekalian CFD atau main ke Monas. Pilihan berlibur singkat yang menarik.

text:
Ini pertama kali saya menulis kesan mengenai pelayanan hotel di trip advisor setelah saya melihat ada logo trip advisor dan saya scan. Meskipun saya hanya tamu undangan bukan menginap, ada dua hal yang menarik mengenai pelayanan dari hotel Ibis Harmoni.

1. Saya sebagai tamu undangan di lantai 2 pada hari Jumat malam, minggu lalu. Makanan enak, tempat sangat bersih dan pelayanan sangat baik sehingga saya tertarik untuk menanyakan paket untuk ulang tahun.

2. pada saat hendak pulang saya mampir di resepsion , dibantu oleh Stevani yang sangat ramah. Setelah selesaj, saya duduk di sofa tengah menunggu jemputan. Lalu ada sekeluarga dengan orang tua yang duduk di kursi roda dan duduk di sebelah saya, salah satu dari mereka ke resepsionis. lalu di bantu dengan sangat ramah , sopan dan sigap oleh bapak chinese kacamata berbaju batik merah dan dipanggil kokoh Kei ( manager ). saya tahu setelah saya bertanya kepada salah satu staff security " dia siapa ". Saya sangat berkesan karena dari pengamatan saya beliau begitu memperhatikan orang tua yang tengah sakit dengan ramah mendatanginya dan saya mendengar "selamat datang dan selamat beristirahat , untuk makan paginya sudah saya atur untuj dikirim ke kamar.  Bapak jangan khawatir". Saya dan suami yang mendengar saja tersentuh , apalagi keluarga tersebut. Buat saya sangat wow sekali pelayananya.

Semoga di lain kesempatan saya dapat merasakan pelayanan sebagai tamu menginap dan merasakan kembali enaknya makanan bis Harmoni

Terimakasih

Menginap disini 25-28 juni 2016 dan saya menempati kamar di lantai 15.
Untuk kamar cukup noisy, saya selalu terbangun pagi jam 5 krn bunyi alarm hp dari kamar sebelah. jadi untuk tidur lumayan.
Interior kamar sangat membosankan krn kaku, dan tidak menarik. kamar cukup luas tapi kamar mandi kecil.
Untuk sarapan sangat mengecewakan, sebab selama 3 hari disini menu sarapan yg sama saja disajikan setiap pagi. Lauk dan Pauk disediakn hanya satu pilihan saja dgn masakan yg sama. Krn tamu banyak saat sarapan, pihak hotel tidak memperhatikan dgn seksama hidangan2 sarapan yg sdh habis dan lambat mengisi kembali. untuk hotel seharga 700ribuan per malam jenis sarapan ini tidak adil.
Yang paling saya kecewa adalah availability lift yg beroperasi. ada 4 lift di hotel ini. di hari 1 hanya 3 lift yg beroperasi, dihari kedua 2 lift beroperasi dan di hari ketiga atau sabtu pagi hanya tersisa 1 lift yg beroperasi. saya mau turun dari lantai 15 ke lantai L utk sarapan harus nunggu lift 30 menit.
Mohon pihak manajemen perhatikan hal2 ini. Jangan karena Letaknya sangat strategis sehingga akan dipilih banyak tamu menginap tapi tidak diimbangi dengan kualitas pelayanan yg memuaskan tamu.
salam. WT

text:
Hotel ini benar-benar memberikan kepuasan maksimal buat saya. Sebagai bagian dari Accor Hotels Group, hotel ini sanggup memenuhi ekspektasi saya dari segi pelayanan, kenyamanan, kebersihan dan kemudahan bertransaksi. Sejak pemesanan kamar, semua bisa dilakukan dengan mudah dan cepat, Check In hotel juga bisa dilakukan via Online. Sampai di Hotel tinggal ambil kunci dan tanda tangan saja. Walaupun saat itu saya harus menunggu sekitar 20 menit  karena saya memesan kamar Non Smoking room yang saat itu sedang dibersihkan. Beruntung ada welcome drink dan kursi di restoran tempat saya menunggu juga sangat nyaman, sehingga menunggu jadi tidak terlalu membosankan.
Seperti Ibis yang lain, kamar disini juga didesain minimalis dengan warna-warna ceria yang menyegarkan. Apalagi tempat tidurnya, sangat nyaman dan bikin betah. Free internetnya juga bagus dan kenceng.
(Saya sampai extend satu malam) :D
Untuk sarapannya masih standar dan rasanya masih perlu ditingkatkan. Beberapa menu masih terasa hambar dan kurang bumbu.
Terakhir, untuk Check Out juga sangat cepat, tinggal ngasih kunci ke Resepsionis dan bill akan dikirimkan ke Email sehari berikutnya (Ini hanya berlaku untuk Le Club member atau tidak saya kurang paham).
Over all..Great Stay..Great Sleep..

text:
Dear Ibis,

Saat ibis jakarta harmoni pertama kali dibuka saya adalah tamu yang pertama menginap disana, semuanya terlihat sangat baik, hanya butuh perbaikan pada rasa makanan pada menu makan pagi yang kurang baik tidak seperti ibis lain yang pernah saya coba.
Dan pada saat itu saya masih bisa menggunakan Accor advantage card saya untuk poin reward.

Lalu pada kunjungan ke 2 (july), ke 3 (agustus) dan ke 4 (30 sep) dikatakan oleh reception bahwa ibis jakarta harmoni tidak berpartisipasi dalam poin reward, padahal tidak demikian keterangan yang ada di dalam website accor mengenai hal ini.

Dan yang sangat perlu diperhatikan adalah kualitas kedap suara di dalam setiap kamar, suara dari kamar sebelah dan dari luar kamar SANGAT TERDENGAR JELAS ke dalam kamar, untuk anak anak yang cukup kritis dalam menyikapi sesuatu maka akan sangat sulit bagi kami orang tua untuk menjawab ketika ditanya "kok ada suara seperti orang kesakitan di sebelah" kalau Anda mengerti apa yang saya maksud dengan kegiatan tamu disebelah kamar saya pada malam dan pagi hari.

Terakhir kali saya menginap (30 sep) di kamar 307 kondisinya saya yakin diluar kualitas ibis, saya menemukan beberapa helai rambut di lantai, seprei dan sarung bantal yang bernoda dan bau, dispenser sabun yang kosong dan terlepas dari dinding, dinding kamar yang kotor dan ada bekas gelas minuman fast food dari tamu sebelumnya di dalam kulkas.

Mengingat kejadian kejadian tersebut di atas, sangat disayangkan kalau hotel sebesar ibis jakarta harmoni sangat cepat sekali menurun kualitasnya dan minim perbaikan.

text:
Menginap di sini Sabtu 27 Juni 2015, kesan pertama saya saat memasuki lobby sangat nyaman, luas, lapang dan bersih, layanan reservasi cukup cepat. Hotelnya baru masih soft opening dan yg dioperasikan menurut reception department baru sampai lantai 6. 

Saya mendapatkan kamar 607 (non smoking room). Setelah check in, langsung menuju kamar - saat membuka pintu terlihat kamar cukup nyaman walau tidak terlalu luas. Namun kesan saya menjadi kurang bagus saat mengecek ranjang sebelum berbaring (kebiasaan ini selalu saya lakukan di hotel manapun), saya menemukan beberapa helai rambut baik di bantal dan di guling, dan terus terang ini sangat bikin mood saya anjlok (baca : ilfil), terbayang bagaimana housekeeping saat merapikan kamar ini apakah tidak teliti, atau tidak mengganti seprai dan sarung bantal guling sama sekali ??? 

Lalu yang lebih parah, seusai mandi, airnya mampet gak langsung surut jadi kaki saya menginjak bekas air bilasan dan ini 'gak banget' untuk hotel yang baru dibangun, langsung saya komplain ke bagian reception dan segera ditangani teknisinya. Saat saya menelpon dengan telpon di dalam kamar, lebih kaget lagi saya menemukan bekas gelas aqua plastik (sepertinya bekas pakai untuk menyeduh kopi tubruk, krn terlihat sisa-sisa residu) dan gelas ini secara sangat tidak bertanggung jawab diletakkan oleh tamu sebelumnya (?) di dalam lampu samping ranjang. Dan sangat aneh bagian housekeeping (lagi-lagi) tidak membersihkannya sampai saya yang menemukan dan menunjukkan hal ini kepada teknisi (silakan dicek ke teknisi anda, saat memperbaikin saluran yg mampet di kamar 607 sekitar pk 20.00 - 21.00). Drainase toilet juga harap dicek, krn saya mencium bau yang tidak nyaman di kloset.

Untuk makan pagi, menu standard, rasa sebaiknya ditingkatkan krn cenderung hambar. Dan sajian menu berbuka puasa (di hari Sabtu malam) - tolong bagian banquet/F & B staf2nya lebih gesit, kalau makanan di meja habis, segera diisi, teh dan kopi panas dibiarkan kosong padahal ini kan sangat URGENT dibutuhkan tamu2. Makanan utama habis dan lama diisi.

Kesan keseluruhan cukup baik tapi sebelum grand opening, saya harapkan bisa ditingkatkan kalau tidak hanya akan menimbulkan kekecewaan bagi tamu2. Khususnya housekeeping lebih rajin dan teliti dalam hal kebersihan kamar!

Thanks.
title: Soon have to be improved to be the best :)

text:
Hotel ibis jakarta harmoni saya piih karena letaknya yang strategis,,,letaknya dekat dengan hate busway sawah besar,,saya mendapatkan kamar yang teretak di lantai 7,,karena baru bau cat pun masih tercium samar samar tapi tidak mengganggu,,,AC kamar berfungsi dengan baik,,air pancuran kamar mandi mengalir dengan baik,,,kamarnya standar ibis,,hanya tersedia satu jenis kamar,,
Proses Check in dan check out lancar dan baik....

Untuk sarapan makanannya standart ibis,,untuk rasa menurut saya pribadi harus di sesuakan lagi dengan kebiasaan lidah orang indonesia yang terbiasa dengan bumbu yang sedikit kuat,,,

tepat disebelah kanan hotel ini terdapat salah satu restoran cepat saji terkemuka dan sekitar hotel dan sepanjang jalan gajah mada banyak bertebaran penjual makanan dan mini market...jadi kita tidak akan kesulitan untuk mencari makan bahkan di tengah malam sekalipun...

Jika tersedia mintalah kamar yang jendelanya menghadap ke sisi depan,kiri atau belakang,,,hindari sisi kanan karena tepat di sebelah kanan hotel ini terdapat hotel lain yang lebih dulu berdiri dan lebih tinggi dari hotel ibis ini,,sehingga pemandangannya akan sangat tidak bagus....

untuk harga,,ibis jakarta harmoni sedikit lebih tinggi dari ibis yang lainnya mungkin karena biaya investasi hotel yang lebih tinggi karena posisinya yang sangat strategis...

kamar mandinya lumayan sepit dan perlengkapan mandinya tanpa shampo,,
serta hanya disediakan satu pasang sendal saja...

secara keseluruhan jika anda dalam perjalanan bisnis atau memerlukan hotel kelas menengah dengan letak yang strategis,,ibis jakarta harmoni direkomendasikan oleh saya....

text:
Spent a night during my business trip.
This hotel is typical Ibis with standard practicality and good service.
Quite some times since my last stay at Ibis chain, I realize their room windows are very-very small. It's not a big deal but gave me an asylum-like atmosphere which made the room felt even smaller. Sound insulation was good and bed was great! I mean it, the bed is comparable to 5*. Bathroom is a bit too small but still serves practically.
Good and fast service during check in and out, employees were friendly.
The only downturn was the breakfast. I'm sorry but the quality was awful. It was very cheap (Rp.45,000) but I'm willing to pay twice as much for a better quality breakfast. That's what you expect when staying in a chain hotel. I hope you can replace the Nescafe Professional vending since the coffee was sucks, really. For Indonesia as a coffee producer, serving coffee with this quality is a hotel is a shame. And hashbrown, almost all chain hotel serve hasbrown with read bean and you didn't.
title: Average hotel with comfy bed

text:
Stayed here for a transit with few hours stay only. Location of hotel is good for my case, near my place of work and next to mcdonald since i'm a mcdonald guy. 

I checked in at 5 am in the morning, there was, obviously no queue and there was only 1 staff on duty for the check in. The process was good, i had few hours beforehand booked the hotel and guarantee my stay with credit card, when i arrived at jakarta airport the accor hotel app showed my reservation was cancelled ! I had my doubts at that time but turned out that my doubts were unproven and i checked in just fine at the hotel. Reminder for those thats going to check in "late" i think its best that u informes the hotel beforehand just in case or use the "online check in" from the accor hotel app, though i have not use this feature.

Access to the hotel rooms via the lift uses access cards so security and privacy should be good.

Arriving at the room, you'd feel the standardized ibis hotel room feels and designs. If you stayed at ibis before, you'd know you're yet at another ibis hotel room.

Bed is ok, its comfortable, nothing too special. Room space is a little small, just like all ibis hotel room, nothing to complain for the price. Amenities are sufficient, you have coffee/tea maker and two bottle of water, safe deposit box is available inside the room, as well as small fridge. LCD TV is a little small but i never have the need to use it anyway. 

Moving on to the shower room, the room provides standing-type shower with one dispenser for bath and shampoo ( those 2 in one shower/shampoo liquid ), that you'd find in , as i know, all ibis hotel around the world, well at least in asia. I dont really like this solution, especially if i stay for long term, since i was only transitting, i dont mind.

Toothbrush and some small amenities are provides in the shower room also.

Check out process was also fast, no problem. 

To summarized, its a good budget hotel with standardized ibis offering, if you like ibis, you'd like it here especially since the hotel is relatively new. Good place for quick budget business trip also.
title: Good hotel, easy access, good location

text:
I was finding for a reasonably priced hotel which I could afford for this trip to Jakarta.  I was pleasantly surprised that this hotel was just next door to the venue of my 4-day meeting. The staff at the reception counter were friendly and helpful as I told of my reservation.  I booked the standard room. As my room was not ready then, I was given a complimentary drink at the lounge while I waited.  I got my keycard to my room after about 15 minutes.  

My room was at the 8th floor facing the main Hayam Wuruk Road.  Unfortunately the window was quite small to really enjoy the view.  To access the room floors, guests needs to swipe their keycard. This is good for security.

The room was decently sized and clean.  My double-bed was comfortable.  Toilet was equipped with standard amenities.  However the toilet size was small to my liking. Nevertheless I didn't mind it much as I won't be staying in the toilet alot :-p.

Breakfast comes complimentary with the room. The range of items on the menu was limited but satisfactory.

In the online info, the hotel mentioned they have a full service spa. However this was not entirely correct as they do have spa service such as massage but they do not have a room or space dedicated to spa services.  All services are outsourced but available 24hrs and the therapist provides their service in room.

Pros: Price, Location, cleanliness and friendly staff.
Cons: Breakfast items limited choice. Full Service spa not as expected.

Overall: Great hotel with affordable price.  I will stay here again if I come to Jakarta.
title: Reasonably priced accomodation

text:
This is my first stay in this hotel. 6-8th Dec 2016. 
I was a regular customer of another hotel next to it. However, the hotel failed to maintain their in room facilities, hence I gave this 1 year old hotel a shot. 
I must say ultimately it's a good deal.

Facilities:
Not much comment on this. For a new hotel, it is well maintained. However, I am not sure how long it will last as the renovation in the room are of cheaper quality. For example, the laminated flooring already started to pop up. Not everywhere but I am sure it will get worst. If the hotel staff is reading this, you may want to include a soap tray at the bathroom. It is quite hard to manage the bar of handsoap.

Staffs:
Helpful and friendly.
I tried the in room massage. That's the only option. It is alright. I believe the hotel outsource to a massage shop.

Breakfast:
Not a huge spread. But consider the price you pay. It is acceptable. Quality wise, it is not to my liking. I ended up walking to the McDonald right next door for breakfast. 

Check in/ Check out:
Acceptable. 

Wifi:
Reasonable speed.

Will I be back again? Yes, why not?
title: Value for money.

text:
Ibis Jakarta Harmoni is a nice hotel to stay in and very convenient to stay. It is next to McDonalds and McCafe. Across the road from Gajah Mada shopping mall. 
The Sawah Besar Halte for the Transjakarta BRT is just across the road which makes it convenient for guest to travel around the city. Hop off at Mangga Besar Halte which is a stop away, and you can find the free City Tour Bus. Ask the hotel staff where do you want to go, what are you looking for, and they will tell you where to stop and where to change bus.
Facilities wise, it is fair for the price I paid for and the service is fantastic. I had few issues with the room on the day I arrived and complain to the reception. The hotel staff respond immediately by sending people to fix the issue. Other than that, the room was great. Many TV channels,  bathroom was fair except that the shower drain clogs which the staff managed to resolved the problem. Air conditioning works just fine. WiFi connectivity in the room was good, the staff gave me the username and password together during check-in. The staff are friendly and very helpful.

However I would like to suggest the hotel management to encourage their staff to practice their english language more. Having a foreign guest from Malaysia is fine if they use Bahasa Indonesia, however if the guest does not speak Bahasa Indonesia ( a "bule" for example) then the problem gets bigger. 

Thank you Ibis Jakarta Harmoni and their team of staff for the hospitality. I enjoyed my stay in Jakarta. Hope to stay there again in the future.
title: Nice and convenient

Their restaurant offer Christmas Brunch Promo during Christmas season. So here we are.

They have various bread, croissant with jam or butter as usual. Salad bar. Fried rice, fish dory, kai-lan, fried tofu, chicken broth, kebab, waffle, roast chicken. 

But what I appreciate most is their hospitality. When my wife notice that they are offering a roasted chicken instead of turkey, the chef immediately prepare few slices roast turkey for us. What a special treatment. 

The other thing I like is they have HOT APPLE which is kind a rare to find it in tropic country hotels. 

For dessert they have slushed ice that you can't miss.

After all it might not the best, but I shoula appreciate their effort to do what their best.

It's a big yes to come here in the future

text:

Room was really clean and spacious for ibis standard. Bed was comfortable but pillow was too soft to my liking. Only thing negative was there wasn't any iron or ironing board in the room. 

Breakfast was decent but spread was limited. For the price,  nothing to complain about. A hotel worth coming back to if you are not picky or fussy.
title: Decent and clean

text:
When my husband Ronny was travelling alone (I stay in Holland) to Indonesia, he stayed, as always  we did, in hotel Ibis Harmoni Jakarta. 

When he want to travel to Pontianak, he get unwell at the airport.
With the excellent help of a man from the airport Roni and the security people pak Budi he was brought back to the hotel. 

At the hotel Ibis Harmony Jakarta he was welcomed by FO Manager pak Rahmat. I had contact with Pak Rahmat  and I got an excellent and super help from Pak Rahmat.

text:
stay here for a few days just for fun. 
the room and toilet are quite small but still quite comfortable.
the service is very good and the staff is also very helpful.
the food and snacks in the restaurant are actually quite good.
across the street right in front of the hotel there is a mall and even right next to the hotel available mc donald.
title: idly stay at ibis

text:
The hotel is situated in the heart of Jakarta, and of course the locatoon is really great. The hotel is accross a shopping mall and transjakarta bus stop, also beside is McDonald's and convenience store. Parking lot is sufficient although it need some walks from parking lot to the lobby.
The building is maintained perfectly and completed with meeting room, restaurants, praying room, lounge, web corner etc. The other great things is the hotel equipped with 4 lifts and 2 of the lifts is panoramic lifts with the street views.
The room is accomplished all Accor standard: clean linen, hot water shower, amenities, TV, safe deposit box, mini cooler, tea/coffee set. It is a clean room, and really meet traveler expectation. The AC is work perfectly and in my experience this is the first hotel AC that being "too cool" even after I crank the thermostat up. The downside of the room is there is no power outlet beside the bed; you know that current generation love to charge and browse their phone while laying on the bed. Also a bigger window will be nice comoared to current small window that blocked by the desk.
The breakfast is nice. The food variety is not perfect but still really good and satisfying. The restaurant area is grand and clean. The food tasted good and theybhave coffee machine for fresh coffee every morning.
For conclusion: this hotel is a perfect representation of Accor standard in Ibis brand. The service and amenities really designed to meet travellers expectation of a good hotel and it is a safe choixe for people who need a place to stay without worries to the quality. Value for money is really great compared to Ibis service we got.
title: Safe choice for travellers

But i love the room will be back again.
title: Stay during pandemi

text:
A week before my stay in Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada, I had to travel to Jakarta and stayed one night over there. Since I also had an early morning appointment in CBD area of Jakarta the next day, I decided to stay in Ibis Jakarta Harmoni.

I arrived in the hotel in the afternoon that day and I proceeded to the front desk immediately. Check-in was prompt and efficient. Within 10 minutes, I entered my room which was located in 6th floor (Room 622; corner unit).. The room was obviously bigger than standard Ibis hotel rooms I had stayed before : It was clean, well maintained and nicely designed.

Breakfast in the morning was good as well. Breakfast spread was good and they were enough to fill up my stomach before I started my activity in the morning. Gajah Mada Plaza is located right across this hotel. TransJakarta bus stop is located right in front of the hotel and McDonald is right next door. This hotel is ideal for everyone either on business or leisure. Its proximity to CBD area of Jakarta makes it an ideal hotel to stay.

Based on my stay in Ibis Jakarta Harmoni, I would comfortably provide a 3,5 stars' rating for this hotel and I strongly recommend this hotel to every one who is looking for quality hotel accommodation in their future trips to Jakarta.
title: Good stay in Ibis Jakarta Harmoni...

text:
IBIS Harmoni  Jakarta is strategically located along a main highway.  
1. You can easily use the low cost Transjakarta bus to go anywhere in the town. The bus stop is located very near to the Hotel. Taxis are easily available within 2/3 minutes.  
2. A big Hypermarket/Mall is just opposite the  hotel. You can use  over-bridge  to go to the Hypermarket . A good number of restaurants are located there including a big super store and other shops. There is nice open air coffee shop just at the entrance of the mall. The  Grans Mall Indonesia is nearby and Taxi fare is around USD 2 only 
3. The Mcdonald "Maccafe" is just beside the hotel and this Maccafe is open 24 hours.
4. The Hotel provides buffet breakfast with varieties of food. There is cute open air seating arrangement behind the restaurant for smokers.
5. The ATM is in the reception area and open for 24 hours
6. The reception staff, Restaurant staff and front  gate staff are very good  and helpful. 
7.  The room facilities are good. The nightly rate is very reasonable - I booked at flexi option and paid USD 50 inclusive of buffet breakfast.
I find this hotel very good for budget conscious travellers and who would like have all basic facilities nearby.
title: IBIS HARMONI-An excellent  hotel with all facilities

text:
We have an impressive stay at Ibis Harmoni Jakarta. The room that given are so related to us which is travel thematic room. There's 3 thematic room in Ibis Harmoni Jakarta. And each of the room are decorated well with decal and ornament. Such as for the "Window of The World" room that we're stayed in. The decoration not only on the room, but also in the bath room. You definitely can stay 24/7 in this room.

If you're here for staycation in the weekend just like us, there's obike rental available for you. You can go through the Jakarta's Car Free Day with this obike rental.

In the ground floor, there's a restaurant (the same restaurant that provide breakfast) that serves an Indonesian food for lunch and dinner. Surprisingly they served a very tasty dishes. For dinner we order Ayam Bakar Taliwang and for lunch we order Sop Iga Bakar. Both authentic and satisfying.

They also provides business corner and meeting room This hotel suitable for business traveller. 

Overall, we give this hotel 8/10 for business and staycation experience.

Thanks
title: Awesome “Thematic Room” Hotel

text:
I stayed at Ibis Jakarta Harmoni for 8 nights on business trip. Upon arrival, I was welcomed personally by the Hotel Manager, Pak Maksum who was at the lobby. Check in process was efficient, and the front desk staff attended to me was friendly (but I didn’t get his name back then).

Upon checking in to the room, welcome amenities was arranged in the room for me, and it was a Wow experience for me. As I did not bring along the right adapter (Indonesia has a different type of adapter set) for my notebook and charger, I called up to front desk and the adapter set was sent to my room in a few moment. Nothing more I could say besides the word, efficient!

My room was perfectly cleaned daily and room amenities (mineral bottle, tea bags) were refilled without fail. Breakfast and lunch spreads served at the restaurant, Taste, was good throughout my stay in the Hotel, and staffs at the restaurant were so friendly too. I managed to get the name of one of the male host, Lana, he was one of them in the restaurant who was being so hospitable and approachable during my breakfast days.

Check out was quick and efficient, payment was accurate and what more could I ask for. Kudos to the team at Ibis Jakarta Harmoni and will definitely be back again! 😄
title: One of The Best Experience Ever!

text:
Excellent, hardworking staff, especially at front desk. Clean, spacious rooms. Next to a 24 hour McDonalds and McCafe, so you might not want to purchase breakfast at the hotel if you’re a late sleeper. For long term guests, there’s a Hypermart in the basement of Gajah Madah mall across the street. If you’re attending events at GBK, try ibis Slipi instead, which is closer. 

Minus 1 stars because of the ridiculous policy of charging 2,000 rupiah when Grab/taxi picks up guests at lobby and exits within two to three minutes (without parking). Who are the idiots who think charging unfair fees is worth the diminished customer experience and hit to the brand’s reputation? Are they fresh Western MBA grads or consultants trying to harm Asia’s competitiveness? (September 2018)

text:
Pros:
Location - Depending on where you're planning to go in Jakarta, this hotel is situated north of the city - therefore closer to the airport and Gambir station. It's right in front of Gajah Mada Plaza, with plenty of food options and next to a McDonald's. Also a supermarket to stock up on snacks and drinks. There's a few local restaurants (nasi padang, bakso) around the place too. There's a TransJakarta stop right in front of the hotel.

Service/Amenities - The usual from an Ibis, toiletries were sufficiently provided. Buffet breakfast was a very nice local affair (nasi goreng, kerepek and such). Very tasty too.

Staff - No complaints about them, generally doing a great job!

Cons - One cons (and irks me a lot) was the cleanliness of the room. The room is not carpeted (which is fine) but there are a lot of dust bunnies and food crumbs scattered on the floor. I stayed here for 2 nights and realized the crumbs never moved ie. housekeeping probably did not sweep or vacuum the room.
title: Not one of the best Ibis I've stayed in

text:
This is my second stay but first review of this hotel.

Location is opposite the mall and a short hop away to the Chinatown area. Plenty of choices for food within a short car ride. 24 hours McDonald's just next door.

Check in was smooth with a minor hiccup but that was resolved quickly.

Room is a standard budget hotel; small but functional. Clean and comfortable.

Breakfast was a standard fare. Not gourmet but palatable.

Ordered room service and the food quality was good. The problem was paying. If you want to sign to the room the server must go to the reception and check if you have a deposit (which I have) and then return again for you to sign the bill. Paid cash to save them the bother. 

Other than that the service was good, staff were friendly and a good hotel to stay in.
title: Budget hotel in a good location

text:
We booked a room directly at the Accorhotels.com and no any function to select non-smoking room.
Upon arrival - Apr 16th about 10.30pm, I believed the FO staff needs to ask us before assigned any room but did not. Suddenly we get out of the elevator and smelled the smoke, we was really unexpected that a huge international brand which presented itself as an environmental friendly hotel and concerning about customer health as its value would treat its client as it did.
We went back to FO again and informed we did not want a room at the smoking floor, the staff just told us that the hotel was full.
I am not sure if this manner should be the first reaction to your guest??? Even in the ibis hotels..
After we insisted not to stay at the smoking floor, and waiting for the solution. The staff came back again a solution that it has another room, however at the same floor...
I am pretty sure that we mentioned clearly that we did not want to stay at the smoking floor!
I was really upset with the illogical staff for his poor problem solving skill.

As I understand, smoking issue is a world health concern, it is really sensitive issue and I assure that your organisation was aware. Still why the hotel could not be able to train and educate FO staff to be more careful and having more efficient response.
It was absolutely terrible.

What is the standard operating procedures?
What is the standard of operational audit?

Back to the booking engine, if your hotel does not have only non-smoking rooms, why don't your booking page has a function to specify client's needs?

It was really disappointed to receive this kind of service from the top 3 hotels chain in the world.

Educate the staff more!
title: Terrible FO staff

text:
Stayed here three nights and we were impressed with the friendly and efficient staff, the location and the excellent breakfasts.  There were both Indonesian choices from different regions of the country as well as Western choices (toast, jam, cereal and milk).

The hotel is across the street from a large shopping mall with food court and several bakeries and around the corner from Telksomel, so it's very handy for setting up your new cellular account.  There is a very convenient overhead crossing just a few steps from the hotel to get to the other side of the street. And if you're suffering withdrawal symptoms and need an A&W root beer float just walk 5 minutes and you've got it. Banks and ATMs are also across the street.

Our room was very clean, bed very comfortable and bathroom although on the small size was fine.
title: Excellent location & price

text:
We stay one night here during weekend 23-24 December 2017. Check in process was smooth, but had a little bit confused as the staff said we didn't get breakfast. After I show the staff my booking detail in Accor apps, then the staff said breakfast was included. Is the booking system not linked well to hotel?
Room is as Ibis standard design, comfort and clean.
Breakfast served at restaurant in lobby, taste need to be improved.
Hotel located beside Grand Mercure Harmoni and McD, in front of busway station opposite of Gajah Mada Plaza. 
The weird things is regarding the free parking. When check in, the staff already input my car plate number to the system, as they said it linked to parking system. But the reality is not, the parking staff ask me to pay with cash. I complain him because hotel staff already told me that I got free parking. Even when I already show my hotel bill to parking staff, he seems didn't believe that I stay in Ibis Harmoni. Thanks to security staff that aware of this and he told the parking staff that don't do that to hotel guest. Seems that there was a missing link between hotel and parking system here?
Overall, the hotel is good.

text:
I stayed here for one night. I was tired working so I wanted a good quality sleep. I visited the restaurant and ask the waiter what item could be served quick and he suggested nasi goreng and sop buntut bakar. So I did try the sop buntut bakar. I must admit the sop buntut bakar was quite delicious, even though the soup was not warm enough, so I asked the waiter to reheated it. It took quite a long time when I asked for the bill though. That long so I almost walk to the cashier to ask for it.
The room was surprisingly spacious, bigger than what I expected from the pictures in the website. The room basic room amenities such as mini refrigerator, safe deposit box and water kettle were provided. Too bed there were no electricity plug near the bed side. There were two electricity plugs near the window, not reachable from the bed. The bathroom was compact, decent size, and also the basic amenities weee provided. Nothing to complaint other than the electricity plugs that were unreachable from the bed.
Breakfast buffet was great for a three stars hotel. The variety offered was pretty various and taste wise was good enough. Some improvement would be nice to make the great turn into excellent.
title: Great 3 stars hotel

text:
When choosing a hotel in Jakarta, it's location, location, location. Location meaning not what's in a particular are, but how far you need to be from what you need to see/do. Traffic is a major factor in this city so the nearer your hotel is from say, an establishment that you have to deal with most of the time, then proximity is key.

And if you're by your lonesome and watching your expenses, then Ibis is a well-known budget chain that can provide you a room that's no-frills, adequate but comfortable enough.  The room has a comfy bed, sufficiently firm pillows, good AC, strong shower pressure, satisfactory wifi, empty mini-ref, in-room safe and cable TV.  The room rate is inclusive of buffet breakfast which is nothing fancy, comprised mainly by local fare but the menu changes daily.  The hotel has no gym, sauna, pool or spa but if you don't need any of them then no problem. It's just right next door to a McDonald's and there's an ATM by the hotel driveway.
title: Centrally located budget hotel

text:
1泊の料金が約4,000円でしたので、ゲストハウスに毛が生えた程度と想像していました。

しかし実際は、洒落た高層ビルで、若者向けのデザインのロビーはとてもユニークで、ワクワク感がありました。

その中のフロントでチェックインする旨を伝えると、いきなり私の名前で呼んでいただき、フロントマンからは、宿泊歓迎の意向が伝わってきました。

お部屋は、窮屈さを感じさせない広さで、スリッパや金庫やドライヤーなど必要なものはすべてそろっていました。

まだ新しいようで、壁には汚れなどはなく、更に清掃も含めたメンテナンスもよく行われており、清潔感が漂っていました。

さらに、ミネラルウォーター、コーヒ、紅茶、また、テーブルの上にはウエルカムフルーツとタルトがあり、感激しました。

朝食は、1階の食堂で別料金にて、とることができますが、ホテルの隣が２４／７のマクドナルドですので、ファーストフードが好きな方にはそちらも利用できます。

比較的長い期間、快適に宿泊するにはとてもよいホテルと思います。
title: 長期滞在には最適なホテル

お値段も安く長期滞在する私にはとてもありがたいです。従業員の方もとてもフレンドリーで親切です。とくに、トライさんと言う方は面白くて優しいです。まだまだ日本の方は少ないけどジャカルタに来た際にはオススメですよ！
title: 素敵なhotel

owner_response.text:

Once again thank you for staying with Ibis Jakarta Harmoni, we are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcome you again soon back to Jakarta.

Should you need any assistance please contact our Front office Manager at email: h8487-fo@accor.com

Sincerely,

Jamal Muhamad
General Manager

text: 방의 구조는 여타 ibis 와 비슷함. 보통 ibis는 룸서비스가 안되지만 가능, 로비분위기나 규모는 다른 ibis보다 조금 좋은듯 함. 단점은 인터네셔날 요리종류가 별로 없으며 음식 질이 조금 아쉬움. 그리고 직원들의 Accor 관련 정보가 조금 부족한 듯 함.
title: ibis 비교

text: Das Ibis Hotel Harmoni ist recht zentral gelegen, nahe der Transjakarta Bushaltestelle Sawah Besar. Direkt neben an ist ein McDonald's. Die Zimmer haben in etwa mittlere Größe. Platz genug für zwei Personen. Obwohl das Hotel nach außen eine Glasfassade hat, dringt nur wenig Licht in die Zimmer. Das liegt an der abenteuerlichen Bauweise der Fenster. Man sieht dabei durch einen etwa 1 m langen Schacht nach draußen. Die Zimmer verfügen über einen kleinen Schreibtisch, einen Safe, auch ein Kühlschrank ist vorhanden. Der Kleiderschrank könnte ein wenig größer sein. Es gibt auch eine kleine Sitzbank. Der Boden ist mit Laminat ausgelegt. Absolutes Highlight ist mit Sicherheit das sehr bequeme und weiche Bett. Dafür ist die Internetverbindung sehr langsam. Manchmal ist es schwierig, sich einzuloggen. Es wird ein überteuerter Wäscheserviceangeboten. Das Frühstück ist nicht mit im Preis enthalten. Für 90.000 IDR kann man es im Erdgeschoss in Büffetform einnehmen. Manchmal gibt es auch eine Ermäßigung für 45,000 IDR. Das Bad ist sehr sauber und bietet ausreichend Platz für Pflegeartikel. Die Angestellten Sind sehr freundlich, zuvorkommend und sprechen Englisch. Von den kleinen Mängeln abgesehen, habe ich mich hier recht wohl gefühlt.
title: Viel Licht und viel Schatten

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Georg

Thank you for your sharing your experience stay at Ibis Jakarta Harmoni. Your positive feedback is precious for us to improving our service and product.

We more than happy to know that you're enjoy your stay with us and we wish to welcome you back again at Ibis Jakarta Harmoni and served you better.

Sincerely,

Jamal Muhamad
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik
